description:
During daylight hours, an exclusive, elite private school prepares its illustrious students for careers in business, politics, and high society. But when darkness falls, the halls of this esteemed establishment transform into an underground gambling den where bright-eyed youngsters learn the timeless art of bluffing, backdoor dealings and social manipulation. In this school for the rich and elite, money is power, and the tyrant of the betting books rules with an iron fist. So when the beautiful Yumeko Jabami upsets the academy hierarchy with her voracious appetite for the thrill of the gamble, the entire student body mobilizes to send her house of cards tumbling down.

(Source: Sentai Filmworks)
synonyms: Kakegurui: Das Leben ist ein Spiel

node.description: [Personal Website](http://2st.jp/500/) | [Website (Kawamoto Muno Studio)](https://kawamuno.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/ushimilksan) Homura Kawamoto is a Japanese manga artist. Together with [Hikaru Muno](https://anilist.co/staff/128746/) they make up the studio Kawamoto Muno Studio.
The artist for the *Kakegurui* manga series.

He started his career at Studio Live working on outsourced episodes for a few years. His first major role was as mechanical designer on the short series [The Cosmopolitan Prayers](https://anilist.co/anime/112/).

After leaving Studio Live he was involved in several [Studio 4°C](https://anilist.co/studio/13/) and [MADHOUSE](https://anilist.co/studio/11/) projects, with the former studio housing his debut as director on the short TOYOTA commercial series [PES: Peace Eco Smiles](https://anilist.co/anime/13427/).

He's been affiliated with Studio [MAPPA](https://anilist.co/studio/569/) since 2014 where he helmed his first TV Series, [Garo: The Animation](https://anilist.co/anime/20753/), and several other anime.

**Notable works outside anime:**

- Persona 5: Royal (Video Game, 2019) (OP Director, OP Storyboard, OP Key Animation)

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/Chom2Start)  |  [SOUL OF JOE (fansite)](http://soulofjoe.jp/index.html)

Currently working for Studio M2.

He's an Ashita no Joe ''collector'' and fan and has contributed to books, TV programs, museums and more. He is also an administrator of the fansite ''SOUL OF JOE''.
She was nicknamed "Yasuko Nyan" by her godfather Naomi Takebe, a producer at [Toei Animation](https://anilist.co/studio/18/Toei-Animation).

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/hiroXtana)

Hiroyuki Tanaka is a producer. Not to be confused with the [animator](https://anilist.co/staff/117045/) with the same name.

Hiroo Maruyama is a producer working for Mainichi Broadcasting System (MBS).

He joined Mainichi Broadcasting in 1999. Was transferred later to the Tokyo office and took over duties relating to the production of animation broadcasts. He was responsible for production on series like Gundam Seed, Gundam Seed Destiny and Full Metal Alchemist, all part of the 6:00pm Saturday timeblock, which gained wide popularity.
She was nicknamed "Yasuko Nyan" by her godfather Naomi Takebe, a producer at [Toei Animation](https://anilist.co/studio/18/Toei-Animation).
